page.title: 06TREE WEEK AT COAGH SCHOOL
page.content: In connection with{Ulster Tree Week} the pupils planted trees, provided by the Area Board, in the school grounds and afterwards an officer from the Board Grounds Maintenance Staff gave a talk on tree conservation. This year the{school trip}was to the Safari Lion Park Co.Antrim. Mrs. Booth and Mrs. Mc Vitty are coaching pupils for the{Cycling Proficiency Test. The School Management Committee, at a recent meeting, requested that the {School Warning Signs}be displayed more prominently, in view of the increased volume of traffic. The Board's Senior Road Safety Officer is dealing with the matter. {Jimmy Kennedy,}a famous former pupil of the school wrote many popular songs including 'Red Sails In The Sunset', and 'South Of The Border'.He lived in the village in Tamlaght Rectory.
